sentences.en: A large percentage of school - books now have pictures.
sentences.cn: 现在大部分教科书有插图.

sentences.en: A large percentage of the population is illiterate.
sentences.cn: 文盲人口占有相当高的比例。

sentences.en: A large percentage of these forces had been flattened by the assault.
sentences.cn: 这些部队大部分都已经在这次进攻中被击溃。

sentences.en: Fees are charged at a flat rate, rather than on a percentage basis.
sentences.cn: 费用按固定价格收取，而不是基于百分比收取。

sentences.en: He has a clause in his contract which entitles him to a percentage of the profits.
sentences.cn: 他的合同中有一项条款，使他有权分得一定比例的利润。

sentences.en: Interest rates fell by six percentage points (= 6% ) .
It is expressed as a percentage.
sentences.cn: 它是以百分比的形式表示的。

sentences.en: Only a few vegetable-origin foods have such a high percentage of protein.
sentences.cn: 只有几种蔬菜食品有如此高的蛋白质含量。

sentences.en: Red is associated with a higher percentage of winning.
sentences.cn: “红色与较高的获胜机率有关联. ”

sentences.en: Taken as a percentage of the whole, the mouth has to be a fairly minor body part.
sentences.cn: 和全身比起来，嘴可算是身体中较小的一部分。

sentences.en: Television attracts a large percentage of the people.
sentences.cn: 电视吸引了大部分观众.

sentences.en: The numbers are small in percentage terms (= when calculated as a percentage ) .
sentences.cn: 按百分比来看，这些数字很小。

sentences.en: The percentage increase in reported crime in England and Wales this year is the highest since the war.
sentences.cn: 今年英格兰和威尔士报道的犯罪增长率是战后以来最高的。

sentences.en: What is the percentage of nitrogen in air?
sentences.cn: 空气中所含的氮的比例是多少?

sentences.en: What percentage of the students were absent?
sentences.cn: 旷课的学生占百分之几?

sentences.en: While Joe sleeps, a large percentage of his capillaries are inactive.
sentences.cn: 当乔睡觉时, 他的毛细血管大部分是不工作的.

sentences.en: Whisky contains a large percentage of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 威士忌含有酒精的百分比很高.

words.tran_cn: 百分比，百分率；部分；百分数

phrases.tran_cn: 投篮命中率；投球命中率
不论损失如何全部赔偿
增长百分率；增长的百分数

phrases.phrase: play the percentages (或 the percentage game)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)按部就班稳扎稳打地干

trans.tran_en: an amount expressed as if it is part of a total which is 100
